info.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central API v2.0
info.description:
# Welcome to the API (v2.0) for Business Central

üìÖ **Last Updated:** 10/30/2024

## üöÄ Create Connect Apps with Business Central

With Business Central you can create **Connect apps**. Connect apps establish a point-to-point connection between Dynamics 365 Business Central and a third party solution or service and is typically created using standard REST API to interchange data. Any coding language capable of calling REST APIs can be used to develop your Connect app.

üí° **For more information** to get started with Connect apps, see [Developing connect apps for Dynamics 365 Business Central](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/developer/devenv-develop-connect-apps).

---

## üìö Important Resources

### üîê Microsoft APIs Terms of Use
Before you start using the Business Central APIs, familiarize yourself with the [Microsoft APIs Terms of Use](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/legal/microsoft-apis/terms-of-use).

### ‚ö° Enabling APIs
Learn more about enabling APIs for Business Central in [Enabling the APIs for Dynamics 365 Business Central](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/administration/enabling-apis-for-dynamics-nav).

### üîß Extending APIs
Extending APIs with additional fields isn't currently possible in Business Central. If you need this, you must copy the AL code for the API and create a custom API based on that.

### üîÑ Transition from API v1.0 to API v2.0
Learn more about transitioning from API v1.0 to API v2.0 in [Transition from API v1.0 to API v2.0](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/administration/transition-api-v1-to-v2).

---

## üéØ Collection Features

### üìä **27+ Business Central Resources**
- **Financial Management:** Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, Bank Accounts, Currency Management
- **Customer Relations:** Customers, Contacts, Company Information
- **Inventory & Sales:** Items, Sales Orders/Invoices/Quotes, Purchase Management
- **System Integration:** Attachments, General Ledger, Journals, Accounting Periods

### üîë **Pre-configured OAuth2 Authentication**
- Microsoft Identity Platform integration
- Automatic token management and refresh
- Environment-based configuration

### üìã **Advanced Query Support**
- OData filtering, sorting, and expansion examples
- Comprehensive CRUD operations
- Real-world usage patterns

### üé® **Professional Organization**
- Alphabetically sorted for easy navigation
- Consistent naming conventions
- Complete API coverage based on official documentation

---

üí° **Tip:** For inspiration and examples, see the open source [ALAppExtensions](https://github.com/Microsoft/ALAppExtensions) repo. Here you'll find examples of API pages written in AL.

üìñ **Official Documentation:** https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/api-reference/v2.0/
